adjectives.description: untowardly (comparative more untowardly, superlative most untowardly)

examples: To disgrace therefore many untowardly asseheades, that through malepertnes thinke to purchase them the name of a good Courtyer, I would have suche a pastime for this night, that one of the company myght bee picked out who should take in hand to shape in woordes a good Courtyer, specifying all suche condicions and particuler qualities, as of necessitie must be in hym that deserveth this name.

adverbs.description: untowardly (comparative more untowardly, superlative most untowardly)

examples: Those ruddy plumes, embrew′d with heavenly food,
When I would suck them, twine to driest coral;
And when I couch between her lily buds,
They surge like frothy water mounts above all:
Surely, they were all made unto good uses,
But she them all untowardly abuses.
